Osteoarthritis ( OA ) is a degenerative disease that affects various tissues surrounding joints such as articular cartilage , subchondral bone , synovial membrane , and ligaments .No therapy is currently available to completely prevent the initiation or progression of the disease partly due to poor understanding of the mechanisms of the disease pathology .

Osteoarthritis ( OA ) is a debilitating disease , which primarily affects joints , especially load - bearing areas such as hips and knees .It is characterized by pain and degenerative changes in the tissues surrounding those areas .There are no current therapies which can completely prevent the progression of the disease .
